reviews.name: Bohemian Boomer
reviews.body: MailBar, yet another way to help manage email on your Mac without even bothering to switch from what you're doing to check on Mail.

reviews.name: NoodleMac
reviews.body: Finally, something good comes to Email. MailBar a more convenient, faster, easier way to dispose of the latest messages while you’re working from within another app on your Mac.

reviews.name: Tera Talks
reviews.body: MailBar is a clever way to get you through the bulk of incoming email without having to switch to Mail or leave the app you’re using at the moment.

reviews.name: Mac360
reviews.body: MailBar is lightweight, doesn't do much more than give you quick access to your email, just makes it easier to get to the messages that matter.
